name: Stone of Time
description:
Made during one week for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 with the theme "Rewind" in mind.

You are an adventurer, seeking out the infamous time stone. Sadly the way behind you broke down and now you're going to head deeper into the temple to find your way out.

Controls:

WASD - to move

R - Reload

Q - Restart Stage

C - Use Time Stone

LeftClick - Shoot

Made by 4 friends - LindenHill Studios :

- Philipp Ruf

- Georg Ruf

- Thomas Gessel

- Arthur Wagner
